This is an example app to demonstrate the design of a Privacy Friendly App. Further explanations can be found in the Privacy Friendly App Guide.

There are multiple ways to display basic buttons. Button 1 is the basic button. If you wish to separate a button visually, use button 2. The buttons 3–5 are examples for highlighted buttons. Depending on the app other colors are possible.
Use the button in the lower left corner to call the Welcome Dialog.

Select the size of the game field. The possible sizes for the game field are 5x5 or 10x10.
Press the quick start button if you want to start the game with the game mode and the size of the game field you have chosen. The ships will be placed randomly.
Press the settings button if you want to place the ships individually. Besides, you can customize the ship set.
The big grid displays the game field of your opponent. The small grid displays your own game field. Depending on the game mode, you can do the following steps:
1. Choose a cell you want to attack by clicking on it.
2. Press the fire button. The color of the cell you have chosen changes to red or blue, whether the cell contains a part of a ship or not.
3. In case you have hit a part of a ship, you can attack other cells until you have a miss.
4. In case you have a miss, click on the done button and hand the phone to your opponent, who may attack your ships. If you play against the computer, the computer will attack your ships.
Privacy Friendly Batlleships does not use any permissions.

Welcome to the Privacy Friendly Battleships App. In the Main menu you can choose a game mode and the size of the game board. Tap on \"QUICK START\" to directly start the game or on \"PLACE SHIPS\" to place your battleships. Enjoy the game!

Select a ship by tapping on it and move it with the arrow buttons. When you are satisfied with the placement of the ships, press the \"READY\" button to confirm. For a valid placement, the ships have to be at least one cell apart from each other.
The ships have to be at least one cell apart from each other to continue.
